text: Earl Klugh (pronounced "Clue"; September 16, 1953) is an American smooth jazz musician who also plays R&B.; He began his career around 1970 at age sixteen. He is also known for songwriting. Klugh was born in Detroit. Category:Musicians from Detroit Category:Singers from Detroit Category:R&B; musicians Category:1953 births Category:Living people
title: Earl Klugh
